author: Manlightman
post_text: January 14, 2020 at 1:47 PM#1Hi, I can't figure this one out with the manual.Can I get the preset ID (or number) and store it in a variable?Right now it's for a simple Problem. I want to build a macro which stores a selective preset as universal preset. What I was looking for, was the possibility to call the Macro, tab the Preset and then restore a Preset with that particular preset ID.Therefore I want to extract the ID and store into a variable.Am I wrong to do so? Is it even possible?Thanks
title: Get Preset ID
